meanings.definition: Having a flat-topped or convex flower cluster in which the individual flower stalks grow upward from various points on the main stem to approximately the same height.
meanings.sent1: The corymbous flowers in the garden created a beautiful display of colors.
meanings.sent2: The gardener planted corymbous flowers to attract butterflies and bees.
meanings.sent3: The corymbous blooms seemed to be having a friendly competition to reach the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a corymbous cluster, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The corymbous arrangement of flowers resembled a colorful umbrella in the garden.
